youtube.title: How a Cold Spoon Erases Hickeys: The Science Explained!
youtube.description: Discover the biological secret behind using a cold spoon to remove hickeys. This video breaks down how cold temperatures and pressure affect blood vessels and skin healing. Perfect for students and curious minds! #biology #skincare #science
